text: Leszczyniec () is a village in the administrative district of Gmina Kamienna Góra, within Kamienna Góra County, Lower Silesian Voivodeship, in south- western Poland. Prior to 1945 it was in Germany. It lies approximately south- west of Kamienna Góra, and south-west of the regional capital Wrocław. == Gallery == File:Leszczyniec (województwo dolnośląskie) (001).jpg|Street File:Leszczyniec (województwo dolnośląskie) (003).jpg|House File:Leszczyniec (województwo dolnośląskie) (013) jar.jpg|Fire station ==References== Leszczyniec
